long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI assistant, web summary, YouTube summary, AI note taking and AI writing assistant. All in one place.

BuddyBeep is here to â¬†ï¸ your productivity by 10x and â¬†ï¸ your browsing experience with powerful models capable of becoming your AI assistant. Forget the hassle of switching between tabs for AI, reading lengthy content, watching hours long of videos and finding a place for notetaking.

What BuddyBeep solves for you ğŸ‘‡ 

ğŸ¤– The AI assistant on the sidebar gives you a seamless, smooth and easily accessible chatting experience while surfing the Internet. Retentive memory makes sure past conversations are not gone.

âŒ¨ï¸ Reduce the time needed to write anything with BuddyBeepâ€™s AI writing ability. 

ğŸ“– Save your time by reading web pages and watching YouTube videos, then create a key summary of everything for you.

ğŸ—ƒï¸ An AI note taking system designed to boost your memory with a design inspired by Notion, but easier to use.

It does not matter who you are, what you work on, what are your expertises, BuddyBeep is confident that you can benefit a lot from it in your daily lives. 

âš ï¸ Additional important information 

BuddyBeep is free, no subscription needed (also no plans to monetize in the future yet).

Your privacy and security are our top concerns. We do not store any of your data besides emails for better communication. No key logging, screen capturing or similar actions are conducted when you use.
